Squid::AddIpPort ( $  if  ) 

Adds IP:port to squid config file.

Adds the line above https_port TAG. Cleans up duplicates first

Parameters:
[in] $if string Interface IP:port.

Squid::DelIpPort ( $  if  ) 

Deletes IP:port from squid config file.

Warning:
If port is not provided, deletes all ports with that IP.
Parameters:
[in] $if string Interface IP:port.
